extracted_playbook.title: Identify GitLab Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the current version of GitLab CE or EE running on the system.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the GitLab version between 13.12 and 16.2.7 or between 16.3 and 16.3.4?
Is the GitLab version earlier than 16.2 with both 'Direct transfers' and 'Security policies' enabled?
Is upgrading to the latest GitLab version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade GitLab to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade GitLab CE or EE to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Vulnerable Features
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the 'Direct transfers' feature and/or the 'Security policies' feature to mitigate the vulnerability in versions earlier than 16.2.

affected_products: GitLab CE and EE versions 13.12 through 16.2.7
GitLab CE and EE versions 16.3 through 16.3.4
